Bio.title: Who Am I?
Bio.text: I'm a computer science student with a strong interest in Linux, containerization (Docker, Podman, Kubernetes), and programming (C, C++, Go, Python). I'm passionate about data science, computer security, and web development (Next.js, React, Tailwind CSS). I also have experience with Git, DevOps (GitHub Actions), and game development using Stencyl. I'm always looking to learn more and take on new challenges.

Privacy.title: Privacy Notice
Privacy.intro: This website does not collect personal data from visitors. Specifically:
Privacy.l1: No cookies are used on this website
Privacy.l2: No analytics or tracking tools are implemented
Privacy.l3: No contact forms that collect personal information
Privacy.l4: No user accounts or authentication systems
Privacy.hostingText: This website is hosted on Vercel, which may collect certain data in accordance with their privacy practices. For more information, please refer to the
Privacy.externalLinksText: This website may contain links to third-party websites that are not under our control. We are not responsible for their privacy practices or content. We recommend reviewing the privacy policies of any external sites you visit.
Privacy.contactText: If you have any questions about this privacy notice, please reach out at:
